featured.text: The dot goes by different names in different Hindi dialects, and “bindi” is the one that is most commonly known.
The word “bindi” means “red” in some Hindi dialects.

definition.zh_def: 印度的一種主要語言，屬於印歐語系，主要在印度及其周邊地區使用。
definition.en_def: A major language of India, belonging to the Indo-Aryan branch of the Indo-European language family, primarily spoken in India and surrounding regions.
definition.example: She is learning Hindi to communicate better with her friends in India.
